# Volunteering
- Bridges ESL
  - I had the privilege of tutoring amazing students on their English language learning journeys.
  - [YDN article](https://yaledailynews.com/blog/2022/10/26/bridges-esl-connects-yale-and-new-haven-through-interactive-english-lessons/)
- Project Access
  - I had an awesome experience as a mentor for international students applying to universities in the United States.
  - [More information](https://projectaccess.org/)
- Yale Undergraduate Admissions
  - I participated in program that matched selected Yale students with admitted students who had shared interests to advise on pre-matriculation matters. I also visited high schools to target high-achieving students in underrepresented geographic areas and promote application and financial aid opportunities.
